metadata.subject: Re: and....another bit of advice ...? on WA

people: Lisa New (Elisa New, Powell M. Cabot Professor of American Literature, Harvard University)

relationships.description: Epstein appears to be assisting New with obtaining permissions for her academic project involving Woody Allen footage
New has filmed Allen for an academic project but cannot use the footage due to legal restrictions
New has taped or scheduled interviews with numerous politicians, journalists, scientists, and artists for her academic work

analysis.purpose: Epstein is instructing New to write a letter using a list of prominent contacts and forward a clip, while New is seeking advice on obtaining permission to use Woody Allen footage for her academic project
analysis.significance: Shows Epstein's involvement in academic/media projects and his access to numerous high-profile individuals across politics, media, and academia

concerns: Copyright/permissions issues with Woody Allen footage

notable_quotes: politicians I have taped: Bill Clinton, Al Gore, John McCain, Mayor Rahm Emanuel, Mayor Tom Menino, Supreme Court Justice Elena Kagan, Sir Mervyn King, Former Sec of Treasury Larry Summers
Woody Allen's legal team said that we couldn't use the film we shot of him: online, for broadcast, anywhere
write me a letter using only the top list and forward me his clip please
red_flags: Epstein giving instructions to an academic professor
Extensive list of high-profile contacts across multiple sectors
Potential copyright/permission issues with celebrity footage

blackmail_indicators.description: No evidence of blackmail or coercion in this communication. The list of 'taped' individuals appears to refer to academic interviews for a course project, not compromising material.

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed. The email concerns academic project permissions and coordination with high-profile interviewees.

details: References to journalists Katie Couric, David Brooks, and Andrea Mitchell who have been taped for the project
Discussion of media usage rights for Woody Allen footage

public_knowledge.context: This email reveals Epstein's involvement in academic projects and his connections to numerous high-profile figures, which could be of media interest given subsequent revelations about Epstein

analysis.summary: Jeffrey Epstein emails Harvard professor Lisa New about obtaining permission to use Woody Allen footage for her academic project, while New provides extensive lists of prominent politicians, journalists, and other public figures she has interviewed or plans to interview for her work.
